page.title: 09THE HAILSHAM LIBRARY
page.content: Hailsham Library owns about{20,000} books. They have 7863 fiction and 6000 non-fiction books, grouped into 32 categories, or subjects. The Rate Payers pay for the books and the Team Librarian from Eastbourne chooses the new ones. They had{2050 new books this year. The Asterix and Enid Blyton books are the most popular childrens' books. Crime books are the most popular adults' books. They have got more books by Catherine Cookson than any other author. About{8000}people belong to the Library. The most they have had in one day is 600 and the busiest days are Tuesdays and Saturdays. About 250 books have been taken out of the Library and never returned.
